sentences.en: "Third World" is an abstraction, a form of shorthand.
sentences.cn: “第三世界”是个抽象概念，是一种简称。

sentences.en: After the abstraction of the juice from the orange, only a tasteless pulp is left.
sentences.cn: 柳橙里的汁去掉後, 只剩下不可口的肉了.

sentences.en: After the abstraction of the juice from the orange, only a tasteless pulp was left.
sentences.cn: 橙子里的汁去掉后, 只剩下不可口的肉了.

sentences.en: Andrew noticed her abstraction and asked, "What's bothering you?"
sentences.cn: 安德鲁注意到她在愣神，便问道：“你怎么啦？”

sentences.en: He wore a look of abstraction and I knew his thoughts were far away.
sentences.cn: 她显出心不在焉的样子,我知道他的思绪已飞向远方.

sentences.en: Held is also hostile to geometric abstraction, in particular Minimalism, because of its reductiveness and flatness.
sentences.cn: 赫尔德也讨厌几何的抽象形态, 特别是具有抽象艺术性和单调性的极少主义.

sentences.en: In C ++ an abstraction is formed by creating a class.
sentences.cn: 在C++中,抽象是通过创建类来形成的.

sentences.en: It includes abstraction layers and classes witch provide extra functionality.
sentences.cn: 它包括提供额外功能的抽象层和类.

sentences.en: Mendelian gene is not a real physical entity but an abstraction or symbol.
sentences.cn: 孟德尔式的基因并不是真正的实体,而是抽象概念或者是说明性的符号.

sentences.en: Objective To research the way of abstraction from Hippophae rhamnoides L.
sentences.cn: 目的研究沙棘中黄酮的提取方法.

sentences.en: Statics, the physicist knows, is only an abstraction from dynamics.
sentences.cn: 物理学家知道, 静力学只是动力学的一种抽象.

sentences.en: The abstraction , generally as the opposite the real, is mostly misunderstood as absence of content.
sentences.cn: Abstraction(萃取、抽象)这个字, 一般的认知是真实的相反, 而最常被误解的一点是它缺乏内涵.

sentences.en: The idea of redness is an abstraction.
sentences.cn: 红色概念是一种抽象概念.

sentences.en: The latter arises from abstraction of the somewhat lesser activated C - H bond in the dioxolane.
sentences.cn: 后者是由二氧杂环戊烷中活化较弱的C -H 键离解而产生的.

words.tran_cn: 心不在焉的；出神的；分离出来的；抽出的
摘要式的；具有抽象能力的
茫然地；抽象地；心不在焉地
抽象派艺术；抽象主义理论
抽象派艺术家；理想主义者
萃取器；[图情] 摘录者

trans.tran_cn: 抽象，出神，抽象概念，抽象化
trans.tran_en: a general idea about a type of situation, thing, or person rather than a specific example from real life
